Recommendations: 1. Approval of the Operations Manual by the Board of Regents before its publication is necessary.
2. Make the Records Management of the College fully functional.
3. Encouragement / motivation of each depertment to implement its own Income Generating Projects may be undertaken to add income to the COllege
4. Increased participation of students in planning and decision-making activities of College is also encouraged.
5. The proper filing system be strictly implemented to reduce waste of times, effort, materials and expense is encouraged.
